response.answer_text: My first opinion would be to see a good apt classical movie. It can make your language more better. Any words you don't get should be searched. Visual makes more sense. So see a good classical of that particular language. Next stage will be reading. After seeing visual video of the movie you will now get the social issues faced by people. You can read any book you like. Don't go for books which is very hard to understand. Keep your standard. Next stage is to search . You need to search for news in newspaper or news channel. After seeing those, you can grasp much knowledge about that particular time. Next stage is to know. The social issues you come across should be searched. There will be lot of social issues to connect to your topic. For example. If it is about war. You can write about unemployment. More points means more better. Next stage is to read memorials and big profiles. We can get more information about people and their quotes. Next stage is to write. Write about each issues you come across in newspaper. Tips for writing. Start with a quote. Give introduction connecting to present or other, asking questions. Give content by answering the questions. Give conclusions by supporting the positive side.
